description: Let a,b,c,...k be all divisors of n; a(n) = (a+1)*(b+1)*...*(k+1).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {d = divisors(n); return (prod(i=1, #d, d[i]+1));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 12 2013(Haskell)a020696 = product . map (+ 1) . a027750_row'-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 28 2015
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 01 2003
